articles.title: Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star, is to be held here from February 15 to 17.
					 The festival to be held in the form of demonstration performance will bring together ace figure skaters of the DPRK and different countries who proved successful in international and domestic games.

articles.title: Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
articles.content:
Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A tablet to honor leader Kim Jong Il was unveiled at the large supermarket Megatitan in Ulan-Ude City, Russia on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary).
					 Engraved on the tablet are letters in Korean and Russian "Comrade Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the large supermarket 'Megatitan' on August 24, 2011.
					
					 An unveiling ceremony of the tablet took place on the spot on Wednesday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were the first vice mayor of Ulan-Ude City, the Buryatiya Republic of Russia, the secretary of the Buryatiya Republic Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who doubles as member of the People's Khural, the general manager of the Titan Company Group and other personages of various circles and the DPRK vice consul general and consul in Khabarovsk and officials of the relevant unit.
					
					 The tablet was unveiled and the participants laid floral basket and bouquets before it.

articles.title: May 16 Prize Winners Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
May 16 Prize Winners Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- May 16 prize was newly formulated in the DPRK.
					 The prize is to be conferred on creators and artistes in the field of art and literature.
					
					 Some days ago, the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea awarded the prize to Pae Ok Ju, a composer of the National Folk Art Troupe, and Choe Son Hui, an artist of the Mansudae Art Studio, for their achievements made in Juche 105 (2016).
					
					 Pae created the theme song of music and dance story "Life Story of Youth" and melody of "Marching Song of Heroic Youth of Mt. Paektu".
					
					 Choe created fine-art works "For the Expansion of 'DIU' (Down-with-Imperialism Union)", "To Kindle the Flames of Great Upswing" and "The Happiest Day", all of which vividly represent the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to deeply impress people.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Arrives
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shinning Star, birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, led by Ri Ki Sok, an advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 The members of the congratulatory group laid a bouquet before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreign Guests and Koreans in China Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Guests and Koreans in China Arrive
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and Koreans in China arrived here Saturday to take part in the 21st Kimjongilia Festival.
					 They include a delegation of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia led by Khench-Yakhavmunkh-Erdene, Wang Wuji, director of the Pictorial Company of Artists in China, and his party, Tang Ming Shi, general director of a Chinese company, and his party, and Li Xiang Guo, general director of a company in Yanbian, China and his party.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Arrive
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Arrive
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Chairman Yun Kil Sang, and Kim Won Baek, member of the Federation of Koreans in Canada, arrived here on Saturday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il

articles.title: Korean People Mark January 15th of Lunar Calendar
articles.content:
Korean People Mark January 15th of Lunar Calendar
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean people marked the January 15th of the lunar calendar, a folk holiday, with splendor.
					 Folklore games of working people of all strata, school youth and children and children in Pyongyang and other parts of the country were held.
					
					 Schoolchildren played colorful games including singing and dancing with a unity pole, rope-skipping, shuttlecock game, top spinning and kite-flying at Kim Il Sung Square and plazas of the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, etc. in Pyongyang
					
					 Families and their neighbors enjoyed the holiday, eating various traditional national food including boiled rice admixed with four other staple cereals and dishes made of nine kinds of dried herbs.
					
					 Catering facilities including Okryu Restaurant and Chongryu Restaurant in Pyongyang, restaurants in the folk street of Sariwon City, Sinhung Restaurant in Hamhung City and Okgye Restaurant in Haeju City were crowded with visitors who came to eat Pyongyang Cold Noodle and sweet rice dish.
					
					 When a full moon appeared at night, people gathered to feast their eyes on it at Moran Hill, banks of the Taedong River, Changjon Street, Mirae Scientists Street in Pyongyang and scenic spots across the country and new socialist streets and villages in northern part of the country.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in New York
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in New York
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A concert "February in Spring" conducted by Ri Jun Mu, head of the Uruk Symphony Orchestra, was given in New York on Feb. 4.
					 The concert hall was packed to its capacity. Among the audience were officials and their families of the DPRK permanent mission at the UN, Koreans in the U.S. and Americans.
					
					 Put on the stage were such Korean music as orchestra "Glory to General", "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu", "I Know It Now" and "Arirang" and famous foreign songs.
					
					 After enjoying the concert, Koreans in the U.S. and Americans congratulated the artistes on their successful concert, saying that the Korean music mesmerized the audience, indeed, and the concert was very impressive.

articles.title: Various Circles of S. Korea Declare People's Emergency Action
articles.content:
Various Circles of S. Korea Declare People's Emergency Action
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The People's Emergency Action to Oust the Park Geun Hye Regime held an emergency press conference in Seoul on Thursday and decided to launch an emergency action demanding a prompt decision on the impeachment of Park, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 Speakers at the conference denounced the Park's group for working hard to delay the impeachment judgment, putting forward unnecessary witnesses.
					
					 They called on all people to participate in the candlelight action for impeaching Park Geun Hye without fail on Saturday, the day of the 15th all-people action.
					
					 On the same day the organization declared that it would conduct the 15th all-people action at Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul and major cities on Saturday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Cambodian and Pakistani newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The January 21st issue of the Cambodian newspaper Nokor Thom Daily devoted a whole page to an article titled "Eternal leader of the Korean people" with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said that the ideas and lines set forth by him serve as a eternal banner indicating the path ahead of the Korean people.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea and the Songun idea, glorifying them as the eternal guiding ideas for carrying out the cause of independence.
					
					 He also enunciated ideas and theories of developing the DPRK into a socialist state centred on the popular masses.
					
					 It is the greatest exploit performed by him that he firmly defended Korean socialism.
					
					 The January 17th issue of the Pakistani newspaper Election Times carried an article titled "Immortal exploits performed by Comrade Kim Jong Il for peace".
					
					 It said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, bearing in mind the immutable truth in his early years that neither the security of the country and nation nor peace can be protected if military muscle is weak, started his Songun revolutionary leadership by inspecting a guards unit of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960.
					
					 He led the DPRK-U.S. confrontation to a victory, holding higher the banner of Songun.
					
					 He defended peace and security of the world by frustrating the imperialists' moves for aggression and their high-handed and arbitrary practices with his unique Songun politics. These exploits will always go down in history.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Congo
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A Congolese preparatory committee was formed on January 30 to celebrate the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Vital Balla, chairman of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and greatness of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and organize various political and cultural events such as meeting, lecture and film show in the period between February 1 and April 15.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was jointly formed by the Korean War Veterans' Council of Russia and a regional social organization "Borozino" on February 1.
					 C. M. Kramarenko, chairman of the council, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from February 1 to 16 and decided to organize various political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in France
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in France
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A French committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was formed on February 1.
					 Guy Dupre, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Tendra lugar 25o Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan
articles.content:
Tendra lugar 25o Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 75o aniversario del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se efectuara del 15 al 17 en esta capital el 25o Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico sobre el Hielo por el Premio Paektusan, dedicado al Dia de la Estrella Luz. 
					En el presente certamen a modo de actuacion modelo tomaran parte los jugadores coreanos y de otros paises que sobresalieron en las competencias nacionales e internacionales.

articles.title: Instituido en Corea nuevo premio para literatos y artistas
articles.content:
Instituido en Corea nuevo premio para literatos y artistas
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue instituido el Premio 16 de Mayo (diploma) que se otorga a los literatos y artistas que hagan aporte a la creacion de obras maestras de la epoca. 
					El Comite Central de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea lo concedio por primera vez a Pae Ok Ju, compositora del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional, y Choe Son Hui, pintora de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae, quienes apoyaron la direccion del Partido con la creacion de obras maestras en el 105 (2016) de la Era Juche.
					
					Pae compuso la musica principal de la funcion musical y coreografica "Autobiografia de la juventud" y la "Cancion de marcha de los jovenes heroes del Paektu". 
					
					Las pinturas de Choe "Para ampliar las filas de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo", "Para levantar la ola de creacion de gran auge" y "El dia mas jubiloso" describen bien las imborrables proezas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Celebran en Corea la fiesta folclorica
articles.content:
Celebran en Corea la fiesta folclorica
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El pueblo coreano acogio con alegria el 15 de enero segun el calendario lunar.   
					Los trabajadores y los ninos entablaron juegos folcloricos en la capital y otras localidades aumentando el ambiente festivo.
					
					Las explanadas capitalinas, inclusive la Plaza Kim Il Sung y las del Arco de Triunfo y del Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang, se llenaron de los escolares enfrascados en el salto a la comba, el juego al volante y la voladura de cometa.
					
					En los hogares se prepararon los platos de fiesta, tales como el arroz hecho con 5 cereales y 9 hierbas comestibles secas.
					
					Mientras tanto, los restaurantes capitalinos, incluyendo el Okryu y el Chongryu, sirvieron a los clientes el fideo en caldo frio, Yakbap (arroz glutinoso cocido y condimentado con azucar, datil, castana, pinon y aceite de sesamo) y otros platos tradicionales.
					
					En los restaurantes de la avenida folclorica de la ciudad de Sariwon, el Restaurante Sinhung de Hamhung, el Restaurante Okgye de Haeju y otros se veian los trabajadores saboreando deliciosas comidas tipicas de las respectivas localidades.
					
					Por la noche, tuvo lugar la contemplacion de la luna llena en la colina Moran, la orilla del rio Taedong, la avenida Changjon, la de cientificos Mirae, los lugares famosos, las avenidas y aldeas recien construidas en el extremo norte del pais, etc.

articles.title: Efectuado en EE.UU. el concierto "Primavera de Febrero"
articles.content:
Efectuado en EE.UU. el concierto "Primavera de Febrero"
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en Nueva York el concierto "Primavera de Febrero" dirigido por el jefe de la Orquesta Sinfonica Uruk, Ri Jun Mu, coreano residente en EE.UU.
					La sede del concierto estuvo repleta de los espectadores coreanos residentes en EE.UU. y norteamericanos.
					
					Entre el publico se distinguian los funcionarios de la Representacion Permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU y sus familiares.
					
					En la ocasion se interpretaron las musicas orquestales coreanas "Gloria al General", "Trote del caballo del Paektu", "Yo lo comprendi", "Hablara del amor del soldado", "Arirang" y las famosas de otros paises.
					
					Terminado el concierto, los espectadores felicitaron la exitosa funcion calificandola de conmovedora e impresionante.
